newsitem.title: ITALY: TABLE - Italy has non-EU trade surplus in June.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Italy has non-EU trade surplus in June.

text.p: Italy had a 3.869 trillion lire trade surplus with non-European Union countries in June, the national statistics office ISTAT said.
ITALY TRADE BALANCE (NON-EU) June 97 May 97 June 96
Cumulative yr to date +19.029 trln +15.160 trln +19.240 trln
Imports yr to date 68.287 trln 56.610 trln 65.512 trln
Exports yr to date 87.316 trln 71.770 trln 84.752 trln
Istat gave the following breakdown for the trade balance with European Union countries for May.
Cumulative yr to date +3.356 trln +3.176 trln +7.015 trln
Note -- Istat said that Italy had a global trade surplus in May of 4.734 trillion lire against a surplus of 7.409 trillion lire in May 1996. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
